name: the International Association for Measurement and Evaluation of Communication
goal:
AMEC is the world's largest non profit organisation representing companies who provide communications research and intelligence. AMEC has 140 members in 40 countries.

A key part of our mission is to represent our members interests in the area of content and copyright and the EU work on the Digital Agenda. AMEC and its members support the licensing of content as currently managed by publisher organisations including the NLA (based in London).
interests: Audiovisual and Media, Communication, Competition, Consumer Affairs, Culture, Enterprise, General and Institutional Affairs, Information Society, Internal Market, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Research and Technology
